para: When Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is on, &elems; of a &mesh; which have no assigned &material; are not drawn by any . Some display methods, such as , never draw these elements in any case, even if Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is off.

note.para: The default value of Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is off. If a &mesh; doesn't appear in the graphics window, ensure that the elements aren't empty, or that empty elements are being shown.

caption.para: A &material; is assigned only to the blue region in (a), a &mesh; was created from it, and a contour plot displayed on the &mesh;. (b) shows the just the &mesh; and the contour plot with Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements off, and (c) shows them with Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements on.
